Description:
Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when an app downloads multiple files from Microsoft SharePoint or Microsoft OneDrive in a manner that is unusual for the user.

Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious OAuth App File Download Activities
Query: sourcetype='m365-threat_management' eql select * from _source_ where eventsource = 'securitycompliancecenter' and eventname = 'suspicious oauth app file download activities' and status = 'success'
